snippet.title: The Perfect Pencil – Launch Window Trailer – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Are you mentally prepared to dive into the innermost depths of the human mind? Navigate surreal worlds punctuated by bizarre personalities, complex choices, tense boss battles and secrets. Someone's waiting for you. The Perfect Pencil, a story-driven action platformer, is coming spring of 2025 on Nintendo Switch. 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo

#ThePerfectPencil #NintendoSwitch
